scripts.say: All ships, focus fire on the ship hiding in the back. That's Bismarck, our target!
We've been figured out... To be expected from King George V, I suppose...
Excuse me, but I'm Prince of Wales... You've mistaken me for someone else.
Who cares, all you sisters look the same to me. Let's see what you've got!
Well, it seems like a fight is inevitable. Jot Dora!
